attributes.additional_details: We the undersigned would like to challenge any senior members of parliament to live for at least 2 weeks in an ordinary house and do and ordinary job that pays a basic wage ie: factory worker, shop assistant,or to live on a basic pension, no privileges due to regular status. They must not use any additional funding only the wage which they are paid, this must pay for food, bills, leisure etc. They can be given a weeks wage to start off with
